review: My wife had met the doctor and it was for health problem. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation. There was some waiting time in the hospital. It was for 30 minutes. Doctor was friendly. Staff were very cooperative.

It was a great experience, a really very helpful doctor. I would recommend anyone to the doctor. She was very friendly with the patient, she was good. She even gave time for the consultation. I would like to suggest that the hospital to have parking facilities apart from that doctor was good. I was satisfied with the consultation of the doctor.

I have great experience, a really very helpful doctor. When I was pregnant from 1st month till delivery she checked me. I can freely consult with the doctor and she gave proper advise. I remember on 23rd march 2020 around 3am I got pain  and she reached hospital within a couple of time in such a midnight and during corona time no one is in the road she drive alone. I had a normal delivery because of the doctor.I respect her and admire her for her professionalism.she is so helpful and responsible doctor .I would recommend anyone to the doctor. She was very friendly with the patient, she was good. She even gave time for the consultation. I was satisfied with the consultation of the doctor. I would give 10/10 , *** ** *** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would suggest this doctor to each and every one.she listen to the patient problem patiently. and calmly. For me  she is next to God. she listened to my problem and treated me accordingly. As I was pcos patient my sister in law suggested me to visit her once. i visited her and shared my problem with her. I told mam that I wanna conceive naturally. She told me that medicine will take time to work so u need to be patient and calm. And I believed her and within three month I conceived naturally. I thank her. So i recommend all to visit her

I had a very good experience with Dr. Kirti. We had taken her consultation starting fron the time we were planning. She was very helpful and exclaimed everything very well to us. I had a normal pregnancy but on the later stages started developing several issues like placenta prematuring and other issues . We were in a very confused state during the pandemic times as every report  of mine was showing different things. But she helped us by efficiency taking all the steps needed as per her clinical findings and finally I had a normal delivery in May 2020. She was very helpful during the tough lockdown times and was always available when needed. I am very thankful to her and would strongly recommend to approach her for consulation.

The problem which we had was cured after the consultation with the doctor from the medication which she gave and  we aint consulted the dcotor again because after that treatment the patient was fine. *** ****** *** **** **** *** we really liked the treatment. The doctor was listening to the problems.She understood the problem and gave the exact treatment. *** ********* *** **** ********** Apart from the cleanliness of the hospital everything is fine.The staffs in the hospital are also very helpful.I would really like to recommend the doctor to all my friends and family.
She was very patient in hearing me out and offered a non conventional therapy guidelines which is very helpful for me. I am obliged.

I visited the hospital for myself and the consultation experience was very nice. I went for gynae related treatment. I am satisfied with doctor treatment and I will give a rating of 9/10 to Dr K.Shankdhar

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Vaginal Infection Treatment,Menstrual Disorders in Adolescent Girls,Gynae Problems,
review: It was very nice and also helpful. My problem is now sorted. I will surely recommend to people who need.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. is very polite ,calm and equipped with the best decision control.Fingers crossed for betterment of my condition. Thanks a lot
